{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = TRENDnet TEW-818DRU.jpg |image1_size = 125px |caption = AC1900 Dual Band Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-818DRU |sp = http://www.trendnet.com/support/supportdetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-818DRU |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TRENDnet_TEW-818DRU_V1.0R |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TRENDnet |model = TEW-818DRU |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = V1.0R |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = XU8TEW818DRU |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4708A0; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = EtronTech;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = ''randomly generated'' |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = U-MEDIA |manuf_model = WRT-C82B |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/15/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 710931130362 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00HKEI3DA |asin_country = US |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"WRT-C82B Rev:UC" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :As this is an AC1900 device, each radio is presumed to be provided by a BCM4360. :The SoC used is probably a BCM470(8/9) series SoC.
Additional specifications, per '''TRENDnet''''s product page, follow... *'''Dimensions:''' [[Dimensions::48 mm x 155 mm x 180 mm]] *'''Weight:''' [[Weight::395 g]]
==Links of Interest== ===Third party firmware related=== *[http://www.trendnet.com/press/releases/view.asp?id=2745 ''TRENDnet'''s press release announcing '''DD-WRT''' availability for this device] ===CES 2013 stuff=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2014/32288-trendnet-kicks-off-its-ces-2014-announcements ''TRENDnet Kicks Off Its CES 2014 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://ces.cnet.com/2300-35291_1-10019288-5.html Image of the device on '''C|Net'''] ===Spec. pages=== *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/trendnet-tew-818dru-ac1900-dual-band-wireless-router-3214 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] ===Additional=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32356-trendnet-shipping-ac1900-router Shipping '''now''', per '''SNB''']
==Notes== ===Probable used PSUs=== The FCC test report notes two power supplies that may be chosen.. *'''HON-KWANG''' HK-AX-120A200-US *'''Ktec''' KSASB0241200200HU
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = HON-KWANG |model = HK-AX-120A200-US |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.8 |input_c=AC |input_hz=47-63 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel }}
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Ktec |model = KSASB0241200200HU |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.6 |input_c=AC |input_hz=47-63 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel }}
